element: http://www.xulplanet.com/tutorials/xultu/morelists.html http://www.xulplanet.com/reference/elemref/ref_listcols.html A container for the columns of a listbox, each of which are created with the listcol element. There should be only one listcols element in a list box. If there is no listcols element, the list box has a single column.
